name: music_videos
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool tiktok_scraper_v2.
Tool description: Get basic tiktok user info and medias. Cheap and stable. Telegram https://t.me/JoTucker2022
API description: Fetches videos associated with a specific music ID from the TikTok Scraper API.

music_id.description: The unique identifier of the music for which to fetch videos.

cursor.description: The pagination cursor for fetching the next set of results. Default is '0'.
